Summary: Lower flying V shaped object with very bright pulsing lights. Followed up by two bright star light objects following it exactly into the sky.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Pismo Beach
There were no other sightings in Pismo Beach on or around September 23rd 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI'm Just going to answer your questions in order... 1) I was outside on my porch trying to stay cool. (it's been kind of hot on the central coast today) 2)I Looked up and saw some lights ...weird because they were strange bright lights that I have never seen before and the craft made no noise.. 3) A plane 4) It seemed to accelerate...but the thing that made me most take notice that it was joined by two other objects (very bright lights) that seemed to accompany this craft into space.... 5) It was a very unsettling experience...kind of wish I did not see it.. 6) They just faded away... Hope this helps, I'm just really interested if anybody else seen this. Thanks, John
